scenario.name: sipp
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$called_party]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 From: <sip:[$calling_party]@[local_ip]:[local_port];user=phone>;tag=[$from_tag] To: <sip:[$called_party]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];user=phone> Allow: ACK,BYE,CANCEL,INVITE,OPTIONS,INFO,SUBSCRIBE,REFER,NOTIFY,PRACK,UPDATE Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];maddr=[local_ip];branch=[branch] X-Nortel-Profile: SSTSHAKEN Call-ID: [call_id] P-Asserted-Identity: <sip:[$called_party];verstat=TN-Validation-Failed@[remote_ip];user=phone> P-Origination-ID: 1cab14fd7c294c95adadaw P-Attestation-Indicator: C Identity: eyJhbGciOiJFUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6InBhc3Nwb3J0IiwieDV1IjoiaHR0cHM6Ly9jZXJ0LmV4YW1wbGUub3JnL3Bhc3Nwb3J0LmNlciJ9.eyJkZXN0Ijp7InVyaSI6WyJzaXA6YWxpY2VAZXhhbXBsZS5jb20iXX0sImlhdCI6IjE0NDMyMDgzNDUiLCJvcmlnIjp7InRuIjoiMTIxNTU1NTEyMTIifX0.rq3pjT1hoRwakEGjHCnWSwUnshd0zJ6F1VOgFWSjHBr8QjpjlkcpFYpFYsojNCpTzO3QfPOlckGaS6hEck7wwd;info=<https://biloxi.example.org/biloxi.cert> CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: sip:[$calling_party]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=HKN 1297772894640 1297772894640 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- p=+1 6135555555 c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 51210 RTP/AVP 0 a=ptime:20 a=recv

CANCEL sip:[$called_party]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 [last_From:] To: <sip:[$called_party]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];user=phone> [last_Via:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq] CANCEL Contact: sip:[$calling_party]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Content-Length: [len]
ACK sip:[$called_party]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Via:] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: sip:[$calling_party]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Content-Length: 0
